bibl.title: Greek Amulets and Formularies from Egypt Containing Christian Elements: A Checklist of Papyri, Parchments, Ostraka, and Tablets. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Criteria. - Patterns in the Evidence. - Concluding Remarks. - Checklist: 1. Certain Amulets and Formularies (Nos. 1-85); - 2. Probable Amulets (Nos. 86-133); - 3. Possible Amulets (Nos. 134-186). - P. 216: Postscript.
bibl.seg: DE BRUYN Theodore S. and Jitse H.F. DIJKSTRA, Greek Amulets and Formularies from Egypt Containing Christian Elements: A Checklist of Papyri, Parchments, Ostraka, and Tablets. Avec résumé en anglais.

Introduction. - Criteria. - Patterns in the Evidence. - Concluding Remarks. - Checklist: 1. Certain Amulets and Formularies (Nos. 1-85); - 2. Probable Amulets (Nos. 86-133); - 3. Possible Amulets (Nos. 134-186). - P. 216: Postscript.
